name: Gangtes Street Fighting Action
description:
Gangtes Street Fighting Action is the New platform and new style of fighting so that you will be enjoy more and get one of the best free games in the store. New characters and street fighting effects make this game more thrilling. This is an amazing city street action game. This game is an infinity war of kung fu boxing and kung fu karate between the slayer samurai warriors
Features
• Multiple levels and rings
• unique combo system
• Infinity fights
• Smooth and easy controls
• real 3D graphics
• Ultimate killing sound
